snippet: A Briton and an Italian who had been abducted by Islamist militants were executed before they could be rescued by Nigerian troops and Royal Marines, Nigerian officials said.
abstract: Briton and an Italian who had been abducted by Islamist militants are executed before they can be rescued by Nigerian troops and Royal Marines; Nigeria’s secretive State Security Service also says that the mastermind of the kidnapping, by members of the sect Boko Haram, died after being shot during his capture.
lead_paragraph: A Briton and an Italian who had been abducted by Islamist militants were executed before they could be rescued by Nigerian troops and Royal Marines, Nigerian officials said.

headline.seo: Hostages in Nigeria Were Executed Before Raid to Rescue Them
headline.main: Nigeria Says Hostages Died Before Failed Rescue Raid
headline.print_headline: Nigeria Hostages Slain Before Effort To Rescue Them
